ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ABUSE.description: Leave it blank if you dont want Profanity in RAM. Else Fill ON.

EMOJI_IN_HELP.description: A emoji to display in help command

BUTTONS_IN_HELP.description: No.of buttons to display in help menu.

LOGGER_ID.description: Create a private channel. And paste here. Value should start with -100

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by using repl or termux. Refer to Repo for more info.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API. Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top. Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the username here.

YOUR_CHANNEL.description: Fill your channel username(without @) to get this displayed on your RAM Alive.

YOUR_GROUP.description: Fill your group username(without @) to get this displayed on your RAM Alive.

SUDO_USERS.description: Userid of user to grant sudo access. Add multiple sudo users by giving a space between userids
